ygData.subject: New Tinkerable item, scuba gear ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello folks, Well, it looks like Verant actually threw us a bone this time, with the new patch, apparently there is a new tinkerable item that we have. I have
ygData.messageBody:
Hello folks,

Well, it looks like Verant actually threw us a bone this time, with the new patch, apparently there is a new tinkerable item that we have. I have heard that it is some kind of water breathing item.

There is also a new component at the windmills in Steamfont, a 'hinge' or something I forget what it was called.

Of course the recipe is a mystery at the moment, (Lets all say it together... "Verant Bastards!" ) I talked to all the npc's in steamfont and no new quests, the water breathing thing is NOT mentioned in any of the tinkering books that we have a present.

So, just as we figure out the fishing pole mystery, we have a new one in trying to find out the recipe of the 'scuba gear'.

Didn't have too much time to do much searching tonight, but keep your ears open for rumors about another book with more recipes or the recipe for the 'scuba gear'.

Cheers,

"FizzWizz" of tunare
